thread.title: iconectiv Appoints Veteran Finance Executive as CFO

title: iconectiv Appoints Veteran Finance Executive as CFO
text:
Jamie K. Oliver brings 30 years of experience to key leadership position supporting growth strategy for respected communications services firm
BRIDGEWATER, N.J.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- iconectiv, an authoritative partner of the global communications industry connecting more than two billion people every day, today announced the appointment of telecom industry finance veteran Jamie K. Oliver as its Chief Financial Officer (CFO). Oliver will serve in a key leadership role with financial and operational responsibilities and will be focused on executing the company’s strategic growth and business expansion plans globally.
Oliver has more than 30 years’ experience in transforming and building strong finance teams for high growth technology companies including the functional areas of accounting, tax, financial planning and analysis, mergers and acquisitions due diligence and integration and investor relations.
“Jamie is a highly capable and accomplished global finance executive,” said Richard Jacowleff, President and CEO, iconectiv. “He has a proven track record of providing strategic financial guidance and measurable, results-oriented metrics that support corporate growth objectives. He will be a valuable addition and a key contributor to the leadership team.”
“With its longtime leadership and respected position as an authoritative partner to the communications industry, I believe iconectiv is well poised to help service providers and enterprises capitalize on the newest wave of technological innovations that will fuel the next era of industry growth,” Oliver said. “I look forward to working closely with iconectiv’s highly talented and motivated team in fulfilling the company’s potential in this dynamic market.”
Oliver has previously held finance leadership positions at several telecommunications companies including Global Crossing and Cable and Wireless and has held CFO positions at several successful private equity-backed technology firms.

About iconectiv
At iconectiv, we envision a world without boundaries, where the ability to access and exchange information is simple, secure and seamless. As the authoritative partner of the communications industry for more than 30 years, our market-leading solutions enable the interconnection of networks, devices, and applications for more than two billion people every day. Working closely with private, government and non-governmental organizations, iconectiv has intimate knowledge of the intricacies and complexities of creating, operating and securing the telecommunications infrastructure for service providers, governments and enterprises. iconectiv provides network and operations management, numbering, registry, messaging and fraud and identity solutions to more than 1,200 customers globally. A US-based company, Telcordia Technologies, does business as iconectiv. For more information, visit www.iconectiv.com .
